<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Deadly Mantis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=296)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These gigantic mantids make their homes within deep jungles and prehistoric forests where they hunt and devour equally massive prey.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/MantisGiant_DeadlyMantis.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Deadly Mantis](/Monsters.aspx?ID=296)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Gargantuan" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 233</row>

**Perception** +20; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 220

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet, climb 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +25 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+14 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
leg +24 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+14 piercing plus Grab

**Fling** <actions string="Single Action" />  The deadly mantis flings a grabbed creature into the air, up to 30 feet overhead and up to 30 feet away from the mantis (the creature takes damage from the fall as normal). If the flung creature lands on another creature, the creature it lands on takes the same amount of bludgeoning damage. The creature being landed on can attempt a DC 31 basic Reflex save.

**Leaping Grab** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The mantis Leaps up to 40 feet vertically and 20 feet horizontally. At any point during the jump, it can make a leg Strike. If it hits, it automatically Grabs the target, bringing the creature along until the end of the jump.

**Rending Mandibles** <actions string="Single Action" />  The mantis makes a mandibles Strike against a creature it has grabbed. If that Strike hits and the creature is wearing armor with Hardness 12 or lower, the armor is broken. This Strike doesn’t further damage armor that’s already broken.

**Sudden Strike**   On the first round of combat, creatures that haven’t acted are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to the deadly mantis.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-72" />
